title: Controlling How Tests Are Run
description: In this lab, you will learn how to control the behavior of test runs in Rust using command line options for cargo test and the resultant test binary.

meta.title: Controlling How Tests Are Run in Rust
meta.description: Learn how to control the behavior of test runs in Rust using command line options for cargo test and the resultant test binary.
meta.keywords: rust playground, parallel, test threads, rust online compiler, consecutive, rust tutor, rust commands, rust practice, rust online, rust online playground
